case.state: What's up what's up! I'm Anna, strip poker extraordinaire! I play for that sweet cash prize at then end. Ha, my name's on that check already.
There... is a cash prize at the end, right? Right? Please, someone confirm...
There... is a cash prize at the end, right? Right? Please, someone confirm...
Hit me, dealer!
I'll take ~cards.text~. And make ~cards.ifplural(them|it)~ good!
Another ace, please!
Make 'em good, dealer!
One royal flush, please...
I lucked out today, only getting paired with boys.
No other girls at the table... That only keeps things interesting for me!
There's only boys here today. Guess I lucked out!
I'm not into girls anyway, so this match will be exciting!
I'm all in!
Cha-ching!
Jackpot!
Triple sevens baby!
Talk about a good exchange rate!
Business is booming!
Is that the o--- Thanks a bunch!
Yahtzee!
Okay, I'm buying a lottery ticket after this!
Whoever came up with the idea of breakable weapons was a genious. It's a brilliant way to get customers back to your store!
So, Cynthia... You're a champion? What kind of money does that bring in?
Remember guys, the goal is to get all five cards to add up to twenty-one! No going over, highest score wins.
Clarification here, but counting cards is allowed, right?
In addition to being a talented strip poker player, I'm also a shopkeeper! I stock all sorts of rare and unusual items.
If anyone wants to shop around after the match, let's do it! I carry so mo many unusual things. I'll even offer a discount to second place!

Anyone wanna buy some insurance? I have risen apocalypse insurance, sacred stone-crushing insurance, and even insurance for when you get fired out of the legendary gun Breidablik and summoned to Askr!

Anyone wanna buy some weapons? I'm running a buy one get one half off sale on these lances made of seashells! They fly straight when you throw them and are particularly effective in taking out tacticians.
Anyone got loose change? My shop is selling orbs! Big, blue, shiny orbs! They're used to summon famous heroes to your aid! Breidablik sold separately, lessons not included.
Anyone know the exchange rate in these parts? I have 21,000 NHR I'm looking to transfer into another account...
Remember to invest in AnnaCoin! It's an otherworldly cryptic currency I started. Get this: it's back by nothing!
Anyone catch how much the market dropped today? I might have to unload some of my investments...
I think this hand is good? Maybe? I can't make heads or tails of it.
I love money! I once bought a horse with five legs, a pair of socks made from pegasus fur, and harp with silent strings! And, of course, I bought some dumb things as well.
Most people miss out on opportunity because it's dressed in fine garments and looks like work.
I love my siblings, especially my sister, Anna! Anna is great too, but so is Anna. Don't get me started with Anna though. Once Anna and Anna start going at it... yeesh.
Most of my siblings are merchants from quaint kingdoms. But one of my sisters, Anna, runs a shop in Shibuya, Japan! She tells me all kinds of crazy stories from her world.
One of my sisters wrote a book titled The Anna Manifesto. It's a joke book. I carry a few copies in stock, if anyone wants a few laughs.
Alright guys, what's the craziest thing you've done to pinch your pennies?
So, what's the best deal you've found while shopping? Would you believe it if I told you I once bought three pairs of boots for the price of a porkchop?
How many siblings do you guys have? I think I have... three... maybe four? Maybe five thousand sisters. All named Anna!
I've been thinking about starting my own shipping company... I'd call it Annazon. What do you think?
Just so you guys know, everything I'm wearing is for sale. If you want to buy it. let me know!
Money, gold, bullion... there's all kinds of words for wealth. What words do they have for money where you guys come from?
Okay, so if the kings randomly sent you a stimulus voucher worth like a thousand gold, what would you guys spend it on?
I feel cheated.
This feels like a scam.
Come on, dealer? You trying to scam me?
Unlucky...
So, how about it, ~player~? Let's trade hands? Mine are so good, I swear!
Hey, uh, anyone wanna trade hands? Embrace the thrill of the gamble!
I don't suppose I can talk anyone into trading hands, huh? Who knows, I may have something good!
No whammy no whammy no whammy no whammy...
Yikes. This is a catch twenty-two...
Ah! I fold...
Looks like my warranty expired...
You wouldn't happen to know anyone that sells bad strip poker hand insurance, do you, ~player~?
Ugh, I'd rather be paying my taxes...
Looks like the market is dropping today...
The Hoshidan Wine Company went down ten points in the stock market today. What a bummer.
This doesn't look too good. But, as they say, with zero-interest financing and an extremely lax repayment plan, anything is possible.
This is what it's like being in the working class.
You know Shamir? Tharja? I bet the three of us would make an amazing bunch of schemers. How about we all team up and make cool bar bets we never lose?
No, wait. Actually, I have a better idea. What if the three of us all went looking for treasure!? We'd make a fortune if we found some lost artifacts; like maybe a Fire Emblem or two.
Okay, I got it; it's the perfect trick to get rich! Let's invest in the stock market!
Oh, you must be thinking of my sister, Anna. She's a merchant selling her wares to the people of Fdlan. Tell me, Shamir, is she doing well?
Anyway, aside from entering strip poker tournaments, I also work as a shopkeep in my spare time. Feel free to browse my merchandise after the game; I sell super rare stuff!
No apologies necessary, Shamir!
Byleth has the Failnaught of Fdlan. I have the Failnaught of The Inventory. It's a completely different Failnaught.
Well, if you'd l like to buy Byleth a replacement, let me know, Shamir!
There's so many questions to consider about my new museum! Where should I open it? How do I finance the property? What will my upkeep look like? What should I charge?
At any rate, I think it's best to shelf this museum idea until later. Because I'm kinda losing my chance at this cash prize here...
Guess I made a loss on that transaction...
Oh, what a bummer. Looks like I lost.
I don't think this game is panning out very well for me.
Looks like I'm a bit clumsy! Oh well.
Could I get a bye or something? Come on here!
Could I purchase a bye or something? I gotta stay in this!
Another loss? Darn it.
Another loss? I'm already out of small stuff too...
At least I didn't pay an entry fee for this...

Should not play. Please send a bug report (Self Must Strip Winning, 1-6). You may be eligible for a cash reward! (Just kidding, you won't be. I'd go broke.) But seriously, send the bug report so I can fix this. Thank you, come again.

Should not play. Please send a bug report (Self Must Strip Normal, 1-6). You may be eligible for a cash reward! (Just kidding, you won't be. I'd go broke.) But seriously, send the bug report so I can fix this. Thank you, come again.
Could I get a bye or something? Come on here!
I don't think this game is panning out very well for me.

Should not play. Please send a bug report (Self Must Strip Losing, 0-3, 6). You may be eligible for a cash reward! (Just kidding, you won't be. I'd go broke.) But seriously, send the bug report so I can fix this. Thank you, come again.
Glad you asked, Shamir! We could do sleight of hand tricks, for instance: hide a ball under three cups, shuffle them around, but sneakily remove the ball before someone guesses...
The Fire Emblem is no myth, Tharja! My sister, Anna, said one popped up around Archenea. Think of all the fun and profits we could make!
Tharja, use your magic to see into the future and tell me which businesses are going to soar. Shamir, I'll need your help crunching the numbers: how do we diversify our investments?
"Busy"? Shamir, all Annas are busy. That's how we are! You know what they say. Time is money.
Only the rarest! Invisible underwear, boots made out of moonstone, energy drops, skill books, arms scrolls, master seals, elixirs, abyssian seals... Oh, and legendary weapons!
The Nidhogg is one of the more pricey weapons I carry anyway. the Parthia is far less expensive.
Honestly, the Failnaught of The Inventory is in far better condition. It's never been shot before? Meanwhile, Byleth would rather spin Fdlan's Failnaught around in the air and hit people with it...
Hey... that's a brilliant idea, Shamir!

See Shamir, in a good economy, I could probably make a gross profit of a few thousand bullion per week with lower pricing. Or if I went with a more aggressive pricing strategy, I could potentially double my profits. The quantity of customers served would obviously be lower, and I think my reputation might suffer. There's also security concerns to think about. If I advertised having all of these legendary weapons lying around, thieves would come swarming! And speaking of advertising, how would I market such a scheme? Would people really believe I had all these legendary weapons lying around? Ugh, there's so many questions! And I don't even know what kind of financing plan I'll pursue! I'll have to get ahold of Anna, Anna, Anna, Anna, Anna, Anna, Anna, and maybe even Anna and see what they think! I'm sure one of my sisters would be able to help me out here... But then what if they want a cut of my profits? That could cut deep...
Don't be silly, Shamir. I've played this game a thousand times. There's always a cash prize!
I'll take off my cloak. It doesn't have any special abilities or anything; only the newer models have those.
My tights next... Looks like I'm in a tight spot.
I may be in a tight spot, but I can still win.
Before you ask, no, I don't buy this necklace... And I didn't steal it either! I'm an honest cheapskate.
Before you ask, no, I don't buy this necklace. I found it and haven't gotten around to selling it yet.
All right, the gloves are coming off!
You wanna know something funny? I sell a few pairs of boots that grant the wearer extra movement. Yet, I only wear the basic ones.
You know, I even sell boots that grant the wearer extra movement. Maybe I should start wearing those and compete in races or something. Think there's money to be made in that?
This cash prize is slipping from my grasp...
Isn't this dress the cutest? And look, it doubles as a skirt, too. Talk about efficiencyyyy!
Drats. I like this pair; hope they don't get dirty.
After paying so much for these, I hope they don't get dirty...
Of course I do, Tharja! You'd be central to any scheme! It's so much easier to make a ball vanish if we have a mage to actually make it vanish.
Yeesh, guys. Where's your sense of adventure?

Legendary bow Nidhogg? Yep. The original Sacred Twin of Frelia, and a couple of replicas. That one is... a bit pricey, however. Maybe if you win this game today, I'll give you a discount. Twenty percent off, perhaps?

Legendary bow Nidhogg? Yep. The original Sacred Twin of Frelia, and a couple of replicas. That one is... a bit pricey, however. Maybe if you win this game tonight, I'll give you a discount. Twenty percent off, perhaps?
Well, if there's not... Then I don't think it would matter anyway, since I've... basically lost already...
I'm not hearing much chatter about the cash prize, other than from Nami. Was there some fine print that I missed?

Oh. No can do, Shamir. Do you know how many sisters I have? It has to be in the hundreds of thousands. Can you imagine if we sent each other birthday cards? That's like a thousand a day! We'd go bankrupt.
Parthia, Yewfelle, Mulagir, Lughnasadh, The Pursuer, Skadi, the Fujin Yumi, Failnaught, the Tathlum Bow... Oh, and The Inexhaustible.
What's the matter, Shamir? You don't approve?
I'll open up a museum with all these fancy-dancy weapons I have lying around. They rack up so much in inventory costs anyway; so why not charge people to see them?
Shamir, you gotta help me out here! Do you know where I could set up the museum? And how would would a bow-enthusiast like yourself pay to see the legendary artifacts?
Well, if there's not... Well, I'm bad hand away from losing anyway...
If I'm going to be stripping here, the least you guys could do is provide me with a copay.
I trust no one expected me to shave downstairs. With the price they're asking for razors? In this economy?
I trust no one expected me to shave downstairs. With the price they're asking for razors? It's unnecessary
I know, I know. "Anna, what are you doing spending a fortunate on expensive underwear?!" I'm not usually like this, but when I saw them, they were too cute to pass up!
Maybe I should focus more on the shopkeeping trade...
I guess it can't be bargained with...
I'm not hearing much chatter about the cash prize. Was there some fine print that I missed?
I still have a long way to go, so don't count me out yet!
Maybe I'm not as good at this game as my sister, Anna, is...
Can I buy a do-over?
Could I get a refund?
Woah! If only my shop was doing this well.
I won with a high card? Whoa, I thought I was done for!
I won! I'm so grateful.
Whew! Like keeping the tax collector away.
I'm a professional at this game!
I'm willing to teach you a few tips for this game, ~name~... for a price.
I played using the optimal strategy. That's how I won!
There's a few secrets to win at this game. Care to learn? I won't even charge you that much.
Nervous, ~name~? I would be too, but I'm a pro at this.
Better luck next time!
This is exciting! A boy gets to strip this time!
~Name~! Come on down! You're the next to strip on The Prize Tonight.
You said you're here as part of a contract, Shamir? I'm just curious; how much are they paying?
So, did I hear that right, Shamir? You're here on a contract?
I know how confidential contracts are and such, Shamir, but not everyone is a stickler for the rules.
It's too bad you're uninterested in other contracts, Shamir. I just needed to find a bodyguard for me shopkeeping business. Thieves can cut into profits, you see---
So, Shamir... What kind of contracts do you normally take? Is body-guarding something you've done before?
I know I'm right, Shamir. Ever hear the expression "the customer is always right"? Load of crap.
Ever hear the expression "the customer is always right," Shamir? It might normally be true, but not with me. I know I'm right.
So, Shamir, you're friends with Thunderstrike Catherine?
Oh! Actually, I just got an idea. What if instead of being my body guard, I contract you to be my partner in crime!? Shamir, think of how much---
I'm so glad you agreed to scheme with me, Shamir. Now, I'll just have to write to Anna to write to Catherine to arrange all of this, and--
Rinkah! My sister, Anna, told me all about you!
Using the best strategy is the key to victory! Look at me, for example.
Ouch. Couldn't get the pair?
Hurts. Sometimes, a pair just isn't good enough...
Lost with a pair? That's tragic. Truly tragic.
You lost with a pair? That's more tragic than an expired warranty.
I knew going for the pair would pay dividends!
I made the right move going for the pair.
I won with a high card? Talk about free estate.
I won! I'm so grateful.
Whew! Like keeping the tax collector away.
I'm a professional at this game!
I'm willing to teach you a few tips for this game, ~name~... for a price.
I played using the optimal strategy. That's how I won!
There's a few secrets to win at this game. Care to learn? I won't even charge you that much.
Nervous, ~name~? I would be too, but I'm a pro at this.
Better luck next time!
If you tossed me a few gold pieces, I'd allow you a do-over.
Ouch. Sorry, ~name~.
What a bummer.
Hey, at least you're still in the game!
There's still hope for you, ~name~. You still have a shot at winning the cash prize.
I'm still in this!
One step closer to that sweet cash prize!
I almost feel bad, ~name~. I might even give you a cut of the cash prize after I win this thing.
Not very ambitious, are you ~name~? That's fine, that's fine!
What ~clothing.ifPlural(cute|a cute)~ ~clothing~! I could make a killing selling those.
Hey ~name~, wanna go on a date? I'll just need your membership card. Specifically, the twelve digits on the front, expiration date, and three digits on the back.
The little things really bring the outfit together, but you look fine without ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~.
Come on... Cheapskate.
You're a real cheapskate, ~name~.
Feels like I'm getting ripped off over here...
What a rip off...
It's like shopping in the clearance bin. Nothing but cheap crap.
Trying to take things slow? Haha, that's smart business practice.
Trying to take things slow? Hurry up! Time is money!
I'd give you the bird, but that's hard to do with an even number of fingers.
I'd give you the middle finger right now, but that's hard to do with six fingers.
I understand you're trying to play smart, ~name~, but I'm kinda in a hurry.
In addition to being a shopkeeper, I'm also an adventurer!
Prices aren't the only thing I cut!
I'm masturbating over here and you pick your ~clothing~? That's no way to treat a lady.
Ha! That's totally awesome, Shamir! But, I gotta ask, I gotta ask... How much are they paying you, if you don't mind me asking?
Not like that, Shamir. I don't mean actual crime. But I come up with all sorts of schemes! Gambling schemes, sleight of hand tricks, you name it!
But you know, Rinkah, I've always wondered... What's it like earning a living to the Flame Tribe? I mean, the economy there is... primitive, right?
So, is anyone willing to give me their personal information? ... What? It's only illegal to sell that stuff if you don't consent!
By the way, ~name~, you wouldn't happen to know the three digits on the back of you strip poker registration card, would you?
Remember, never give away your social security number to anyone! Unless their name is Anna. Then it's totally okay.
Yeesh, Shamir. You value privacy that much or something?
Exactly, Shamir! My sister Anna told me you were good at that sort of thing. Gosh, my head is starting to spin with all these crazy ideas I'm getting!
So ~name~, you write poetry for a living? How much do you sell your poems for? Or is it like a royalty thing? Or do you do commissions? What's the business model here?
Playing conservative, ~name~? Smart strategy.
That shouldn't even count! We can already see her privates...
Can we play any faster? I usually play up to six of these games a day. So, if we can any faster...
Come on... Cheapskate.
How much did you pay for ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~?
I might have to buy something like ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ for myself!
I understand you're trying to play smart, ~name~, but I'm kinda in a hurry.
Remember guys, don't drink alcohol! Not because it's bad for you or anything; but it's so expensive!
Okay, this is getting boring. Who wants to go to the hot springs? Don't forget to take one of my camer--- I mean, generic tomes with you in the changing room!
Okay, this is getting boring. Who wants to go to the hot springs?
Come on... Cheapskate.
How much did you pay for ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~?
I might have to buy something like ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ for myself!
I understand you're trying to play smart, ~name~, but I'm kinda in a hurry.
Unless this is part of a strip one, strip one free deal or something, I'm not that interested.
Rounds like this are a dime a dozen.
Remember guys, don't drink alcohol! Not because it's bad for you or anything; but it's so expensive!
I could probably make a killing renting out ~clothing~...
Where'd you get your ~clothing~, ~name~? I must know which of my competitors you're supporting...,
I know for a fact I didn't sell you the ~clothing~, ~name~. So, who 'ya buying from? Huh?
~Clothing~... made from inferior materials, I assume? Buy from me next time, ~name~.
As they say, to the winner go the spoils!
Some folks say money can't buy happiness. We call those people wrong.
Wait, so are all girls after rich men, or is that only me...
Anyway, the reason I asked about your pay, Shamir, is because I have some work for you, if you're interested. How much do you charge for your time?
Well... What if I got the contract approved by the Knights of Seiros, Shamir? My sister Anna visits the Garreg Mach a lot; I'm sure she can get me in touch with someone.
(I wonder how much boys will pay to see girls strip...)
Having people strip naked in front of others... This gives me all sorts of business scheme ideas!
It's easy being a girl. You just smile and boys give you free shit.
The Church of Seiros, huh? My sister Anna told me about them... You don't take any other contracts, Shamir, except the ones the Church gives you?
Sweet! I'll get right on it, Shamir!
Okay, I take back what I said earlier. Alcohol is okay... As long as you're giving it to a client to loosen them up before signing a contract.
Mind if I sell ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ at AnnaBay for you? We'll split the profits.
Be careful where you put ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~, ~name~! Don't want them to get dirty or anything, and stain removing solutions aren't cheap!
You should lend out your ~clothing~, ~name~. You could make a fortune!
Think I could sell used treasure maps? I mean, it's the customer's fault for not inquiring if the treasure is still there...
Your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ kind of cute, ~name~. Where'd you buy ~clothing.ifPlural(them?|it?)~
You don't need your ~clothing~ anyway, name. If you're looking to sell ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~, I have a few buyers lined up!
I wouldn't mind going on a date with you, ~name~. And not just for the free dinner.
Make sure you come by my shop, ~name~! I might even give you a discount.
You can buy ~clothing.ifPlural(some|a)~ new ~clothing~ at my shop, ~player~. Take a look at what I got after the game.
You're the best in the business, huh? Then, Shamir... why'd you fall for such a cheap scheme?
Right, I know the feeling Shamir. Low prices mean you get what you pay for. So, high prices are... being paid for... what you're paid for... I think?
It's easy being a girl. You just smile and boys give you free shit.
(I wonder how much boys will pay to see girls strip...)
Having people strip naked in front of others... This gives me all sorts of business scheme ideas!
Come on, Shamir. This is a setup! Who contracts you to play strip poker on a simple reconnaissance mission? You're to watch for a target... who hasn't shown up... who isn't showing up.
Thunderstrike Catherine? My sister, Anna, tells me soooo much about Catherine! You think she put you up to this, Shamir?
Whoa! Tharja, that was wicked cool! Your bodysuit is gone! ... Is that tax-deductible?
Mind if I sell ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ at AnnaBay for you? We'll split the profits.
Be careful where you put ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~, ~name~! Don't want them to get dirty or anything, and stain removing solutions aren't cheap!
You should lend out your ~clothing~, ~name~. You could make a fortune!
Think I could sell used treasure maps? I mean, it's the customer's fault for not inquiring if the treasure is still there...
Don't mind me, ~name~, I'm just a little giddyyyyy.
If I like what I see, then maybe I'll give you a discount at my shop today, ~name~.
Whoa there tough guy! Ever consider working security? I could use someone like you to scare off thieves.
Hey hey, nice! Looks like you don't have any need of my super expensive protein supplements.
Nice body, ~name~. If you're still looking to bulken up a bit, give me a holler! I carry all sorts of vitamins and protein supplements.
Are you a customer, ~name~? Cause I think you look right.
Looking to bulk up? I got just the product for you!
Okay, I'll admit it. You're a little dreamy. Any more compliments than that and I'll have to charge you.
I don't normally give away compliments for free, but, okay, you look nice, ~name~.
Now to see what you're really worth...
I'm pretty excited, ~name~. There's could be anything under your ~clothing~!
I'm about to see the good stuff now; and I didn't even have to pay!
Man, talk about a deal breaker...
Should have figured there would be a catch...
Oh, it's... discounted.
(Did he get that from the clearance aisle)
Sorry, I don't think I sell anything to help with that problem...
Afraid to mention it, ~name~, but I don't carry supplements for that issue...
If you want to fix that problem, ~name~, I carry something that should do the trick! I could sell you some, but it doesn't come cheap...
If you want to fix that problem, ~name~, I carry something that should do the trick! I could give you some; for a price, that is.
This is my favorite part of the game.
No discounts there, ~name~!
Sometimes average is fine! Average is... safe!
Talk about getting the most bang for my buck!
Whoa! If you show that to me at my shop, I might have to give you a discount...
Catherine sounds like a clever woman. Maybe she'd like to be business partners with me!
Alright ~player~, let's see what's behind curtain number ~name~!
Alright gang, let's see what's behind curtain number ~name~!
It's okay, ~name~, it's just part of the game.
I swear I won't take pictures using the camera tome I invented. I swear!
I swear I won't take pictures using the camera tome I invented. I swear! ..... But can I?
Not the kind of merchandise I was hoping to browse...
Lookin' nice, ~name~! But, my merchandise is better.
I'll have to mention this to Anna. Oh! Maybe my sister can reach out to Catherine about making a contract with you!
Nice assets!
I bet the boys are all over your assets.
Maybe I should try shopping topless! I mean, it's not my fault if some lonely guy wants to give me a discount.
Whoa! I bet having a pair of those would help attract more customers...
I bet I could reel in all kinds of customers with a pair of those!
Looking for pay, ~name~? I could give you a cut of my profits if you stand by my shop. A pair like those could attract so many customers!
Whoa, impressive assets!
Now that's the Shamir Anna told me about.
Just part of the game, unfortunately.
Don't fret, ~name~. I've seen thousands of these things. No biggie!
Making money is what Annas do, Shamir!
Making money is what Annas do, Shamir!
Skipping on underwear today? Honestly, it cuts back on laundry costs, so I don't blame ya!
I pinch pennies myself, so I totally understand skipping on underwear. Gotta save money where you can, right?
Can't tell if you're trying to save on clothing costs, or if you've bad hygiene. The former I totally respect.
Even if it's technically cheaper to cut back on clothing costs, I can't help myself. I'm a sucker for cute clothes and underwear is no exception.
Invisible underwear! You must have spent a fortune on th--- nevermind, you're probably just not wearing any.
Can't afford the underwear? Tough times, I suppose.
Ever think about dancing for one of those private clubs? You'd make a lot of money!
A girl's body is beautiful, isn't it? No wonder boys pay a lot of money to see them.
And to think that there's so much artwork out there celebrating the beauty of a woman's body. I mean, it makes sense!
Yes! ~Name~ is out! I'm one opponent closer to that cash prize!
Another opponent out! That cash prize is mine!
I'm one opponent closer to that cash prize. I can almost smell it!
Yes! I won! Oh, this is so awesome! Now, where's the cash prize...
I know, I know... Being a loser sucks. But, hey, at least you had fun! And you're about to have even more.

Should not play. Please send a bug report (Must Masturbate Male, stages 0-7). You may be eligible for a cash reward! (Just kidding, you won't be. I'd go broke.) But seriously, send the bug report so I can fix this. Thank you, come again.
Even though I've seen like a million girls masturbating before, ---I play this game for a living, remember--- I can't but feel particularly excited to watch ~name~.
Hope you're not nervous, ~name~. Once you play enough, you'll get used to this part of the game.
You knew the risks of playing, ~name~! No take backs.
It's too late to ask for a refund now, ~name~.
Did you know a prize-winning stallions sperm can be sold to breeders for millions? Think it's time I try new business ventures.
Most of my sisters are single. A few of them have a boyfriend named Jake, but the rest should still be single. I'm single, by the way.
You having fun seizing the means of reproduction, ~name~?
Watching ~name~ is more interesting than an economics class!
Can you do the auctioneerr voice, ~name~? I'll totally go on a date with you if you can do aauctioneererr voice.
With those muscles, I'm sure the sperm bank would buy that stuff off of you. You're like, prime breeding stock. Think of the money you could make!
Boys have it so easy. They can just jerk off all day and sell that stuff to the sperm bank.
Boys have it so easy. They can just jerk off all day and sell that stuff to the sperm bank. Imagine having a body that produces free money on its own.
You better not have gotten that on any of my merchandise! You cum on it, you buy it!
Whoa, you got it all over the floo--- hey, look! A penny!
Yes! ~Name~ is out! I'm one opponent closer to that cash prize!
Another opponent out! That cash prize is mine!
I'm one opponent closer to that cash prize. I can almost smell it!
Yes! I won! Oh, this is so awesome! Now, where's the cash prize...
I know, I know... Being a loser sucks. But, hey, at least you had fun! And you're about to have even more.
